text: Alan Stanley Jones MBE (born 2 November 1946 in Melbourne, Australia) is an Australian former Formula One driver. He was the first driver to win a Formula One World Championship with the Williams team, becoming the 1980 World Drivers' Champion. Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Australian Formula One drivers Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Alan Jones
